Text.Page:
This ledger must go to {@LinkCreature:241#1025$$Grunath} at Feral Valley Station. He's the prefect there, so he should know what to do with it.

You've risked your lives for us. Thank you, .

It would appear the selvaras thieves are abducting people and selling them to the Legion of Thulsa.

It's the legion we must watch closely from now on.
